name: Gluten-Free Penne
description: Certified gluten-free penne pasta, perfect for gluten sensitivities.
serverNotes: Gluten-free penne made from rice or corn. Dry pasta, no eggs. Safe for gluten sensitivities. Holds sauce well, versatile for any dish.

name: Mezzi Rigatoni
description: Short ridged tube pasta, perfect for chunky sauces.
serverNotes: Classic dry Italian pasta. Ridged tubes catch sauce beautifully. No eggs - traditional dry semolina pasta. Pairs with hearty sauces, meat sauces, cream sauces.

name: Spaghetti
serverNotes: Traditional Italian spaghetti. Dry semolina pasta, no eggs. Perfect for oil-based sauces, marinara, carbonara. Classic, versatile, crowd-pleasing.

name: Fiori
description: Flower-shaped pasta that catches sauces in its delicate petals.
serverNotes: Beautiful flower-shaped dry pasta. No eggs. Delicate appearance, excellent for cream sauces, pesto. Adds visual appeal to dishes. Great conversation piece.

name: Orecchiette
serverNotes: Traditional Puglian 'little ears' pasta. Dry semolina, no eggs. Small cup shape catches chunky sauces, vegetables. Perfect for broccoli rabe, seafood sauces. Rustic Italian style.

name: Pappardelle
description: Wide, flat ribbon pasta - our fresh house-made variety.
serverNotes: FRESH house-made pappardelle. Contains EGGS and gluten. Wide ribbons perfect for rich meat sauces, Bolognese, wild boar. Luxurious texture, traditional Northern Italian style. Fresh pasta = superior quality.

name: Cheese Ravioli
description: Fresh pillows of pasta filled with ricotta and Parmesan cheese.
serverNotes: FRESH house-made ravioli. Contains EGGS, gluten, and DAIRY (ricotta, Parmesan filling). Delicate, tender, rich. Perfect with butter sage sauce, marinara, cream sauce. Premium fresh pasta experience.
